page.title: 19INFANT SCHOOL-ASSEMBLIES.
page.content: At our Infant School we help to take Assemblies on two days a week.All the children come into the Hall and join in.Those who help go to the front.We sing hymns.We have a piano,and one teacher plays a guitar. We make up our own prayers to God. Sometimes we act stories from the Bible.We draw pictures and show them to everyone. For the last Assembly before we go to Junior School,we remembered what we did while we have been at this school. We remembered our first days at school,and learning to read and write. We remembered the fun of Christmas concerts and parties;going on Nature walks and studying the trees in the playground. We enjoyed a visit from actors who acted"Alice in Wonderland".We gave God thanks for happy times at our school.L
